content.new:
Here is a copy/pasted block from my urdf where I declare my force/torque sensor,
```
<gazebo reference="left_arm_j6">
    <sensor name="left_arm_j6_ft_sensor" type="force_torque">
      <pose>0.0637 -0.202 0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0</pose>
      <always_on>tru
```
